memberdef.argsstring: (std::shared_ptr< pele::BasePotential > potential, pele::Array< double > &coords, const double temperature)
memberdef.name: MC

detaileddescription.para: this will trigger premature exit from the MC run loop
perform the configuration tests. Stop as soon as one of them fails

memberdef.argsstring: (pele::Array< double > xtrial, double etrial, pele::Array< double > xold, double eold)
memberdef.name: do_accept_tests

detaileddescription.para: perform the acceptance tests. Stop as soon as one of them fails
perform the configuration tests. Stop as soon as one of them fails

memberdef.argsstring: (pele::Array< double > x, double energy, bool success)
memberdef.name: do_actions

detaileddescription.para: Monte Carlo _coords and _trialcoords are arrays that store coordinates and trial coordinates respectively _potential is on object of Pele::BasePotential type that defines the interaction potential _E_reject_count is the count of rejections due to an energy test (e.g. Metropolis) _conf_reject_count is the count of rejections due to a configuration test (e.g. spherical container) _niter is the count of steps whithin a MCMC run, it is reset to zero at the end of the run _nitercount is the cumulative number of MCMC steps taken by the class _neval is the number of energy evaluations _temperature is the temperature at which the simulation is performed _energy is the current energy of the system _success records whether the step has been accepted or rejected
